duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, coordinate, and implement government affairs strategies at state and local levels
Build and expand relationships with public officials and influential policy makers
Work collaboratively to grow grass roots and third-party support
Develop and manage political contribution strategies where permitted by law
Represent the company before external constituencies
Draft, analyze, and present legislation, franchise/contract language, amendments, and testimony
Manage outside counsel, consultants, or lobbyists as necessary
Manage interactions with local governments on permitting, right-of-way, and other concerns
Review, interpret, and communicate terms and conditions of contracts for compliance with legal and regulatory obligations
Respond to and monitor resolution of escalated complaints from government authorities
Manage franchise renewal and transfer efforts for assigned franchises
Identify and facilitate government-related business opportunities and discussions with business

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Public Policy, Law, or a related field (Master's preferred)
